Text: Hrithik Roshan is an Indian actor known for his work in Bollywood films.
Triplets:<Hrithik Roshan
1:
--------------------
Text: Hrithik Roshan filmography:  As a child, he made uncredited appearances in three films directed by his maternal grandfather, J. Om Prakash, the first of which was in "Aasha" (1980).
Triplets:<Hrithik Roshan
2:
--------------------
Text: Hrithik Roshan filmography:  In 1986, Roshan played the adopted son of Rajinikanth's character in Prakash's crime drama "Bhagwaan Dada".
Triplets:<Hrithik Roshan
3:
--------------------
Text: Hrithik Roshan filmography:  Roshan subsequently worked as an assistant director on four films, including "Khudgarz" (1987) and "Karan Arjun" (1995), all of which were directed by his father, Rakesh.
